Yoon Rong Rong

Introduction

GLAM, acronym for "GirLs be AMbitious", was a four-member girl group created as a collaboration between Big Hit Entertainment and Source Music. They originally debuted as five on July 16, 2012 with the single "Party (XXO)". The group disbanded in 2015.

disbanded
